name: mri_nlfilter
description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

inputs.name: Input Image File
inputs.description: The input image file to be processed.

inputs.name: Output Image File
inputs.description: The output image file where the processed image will be saved.

inputs.name: Blur Sigma
inputs.description: Specify sigma of the blurring kernel. Default is 0.500.

inputs.name: Gaussian Sigma
inputs.description: Filter with Gaussian instead of median. Requires sigma value.

inputs.name: Mean Filter Flag
inputs.description: Filter with mean instead of median.

inputs.name: Window Size
inputs.description: Specify window size used for offset calculation. Default is 3.

inputs.name: No Offsets Flag
inputs.description: Don't use offsets, just apply standard filters.

inputs.name: No Crop Flag
inputs.description: Don't crop to >0 region of image.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
